document.heading: Department of Small and Local Business Development Subcontracting Clarification, Benefit Expansion, and Grant-Making Authority Amendment Act of 2008

history.narrative: Law 17-207, the “Department of Small and Local Business Development Subcontracting Clarification, Benefit Expansion, and Grant-Making Authority Amendment Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-444 which was referred to Economic Development. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on April 1, 2008, and May 6, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 20, 2008, it was assigned Act No. 17-379 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-207 became effective on July 18, 2008.
